name: Stairway To Heaven (AsbjoernB)
description:
This was made during a 5-day long gamejam with the theme "Ascend".

The game combines a hex-grid chess-like strategy element, akin to Faeria. The actions you can perform on the board is based on the cards in your deck, which you build up as you go. Everything is done with the mouse. Simply drag cards to the tile you want to use it on. Get as high as possible. Play time is about 5-15 minutes.

This showcases the basic game loop of a potentially greater game, but I simply didn't have time to implement the amount of content to get that amount of depth.

Let me know if you enjoy it ;)
